entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 08:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: W 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow becoming mixed with rain early this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Snow at times mixed with rain beginning near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
